articles.title: Scientists discover protein that rejuvenates aging brain cells
articles.title_tr: Scientists discover protein that rejuvenates aging brain cells
articles.summary: A newly identified protein may hold the key to rejuvenating aging brain cells. Researchers found that boosting DMTF1 can restore the ability of neural stem cells to regenerate, even when age-related damage has set in. Without it, these cells struggle to renew and support memory and learning. The findings raise hopes for treatments that could slow or even reverse aspects of brain aging.
articles.summary_tr: A newly identified protein may hold the key to rejuvenating aging brain cells. Researchers found that boosting DMTF1 can restore the ability of neural stem cells to regenerate, even when age-related damage has set in. Without it, these cells struggle to renew and support memory and learning. The findings raise hopes for treatments that could slow or even reverse aspects of brain aging.
articles.long_summary: A newly identified protein may hold the key to rejuvenating aging brain cells. Researchers found that boosting DMTF1 can restore the ability of neural stem cells to regenerate, even when age-related damage has set in. Without it, these cells struggle to renew and support memory and learning. The findings raise hopes for treatments that could slow or even reverse aspects of brain aging.
articles.long_summary_tr: A newly identified protein may hold the key to rejuvenating aging brain cells. Researchers found that boosting DMTF1 can restore the ability of neural stem cells to regenerate, even when age-related damage has set in. Without it, these cells struggle to renew and support memory and learning. The findings raise hopes for treatments that could slow or even reverse aspects of brain aging.

articles.title_tr: 91 yıllık lastik devi kepenk indiriyor! Yüzlerce kişi işsiz kalacak...
articles.summary: ABD’nin köklü lastik dağıtım şirketlerinden Community Wholesale Tire Distributors, iki tesisini kalıcı olarak kapatma ve 140’tan fazla çalışanı işten çıkarma kararı aldı. Artan maliyetler, düşen talep ve pandemi sonrası ekonomik baskılar sektörde ciddi bir daralma dalgası yaratıyor.

articles.title: ING: TCMB'nin kademeli faiz indirimine devam etmesini bekliyoruz
articles.title_tr: ING: TCMB'nin kademeli faiz indirimine devam etmesini bekliyoruz
articles.summary: ING Bank, TCMB'nin enflasyon hedefinde değişiklik yapmadan, tahmin aralığını yükselterek orta noktayı piyasa beklentilerine yaklaştırmasını, enflasyon görünümüne ilişkin nispeten olumlu değerlendirme olarak nitelendirdi. Banka kademeli faiz indirimlerinin devam edeceğinin beklendiğini kaydetti.

articles.summary: Teknoloji dünyasında bazen inanılmaz şanslı olaylar gerçekleşebiliyor. Bir Reddit kullanıcısı, yerel bir elektronik atık alanında piyasa değeri oldukça yüksek olan değerli donanım parçaları buldu. Geri dönüşüm konteynerinde tesadüfen bulunan bu bileşenler, mevcut bellek krizi nedeniyle ciddi bir maddi değere sahip. Çöplükten çıkan değerli donanım parçaları şaşırtıyor Kullanıcı normalde eski Pentium işlemciler bulmak umuduyla bu alanı […]

articles.title_tr: 2026 ocak ayı ABD enflasyon rakamları ne zaman, saat kaçta açıklanacak?
articles.summary: Şubat ayının ilerlemesiyle birlikte ABD enflasyon verileri ekonomi gündeminin merkezine yerleşti. Geçen ay açıklanan rakamların ardından bu kez nasıl bir tablo ortaya çıkacağı merak ediliyor. Küresel piyasalar verileri beklerken özellikle yatırımcılar "ABD enflasyon rakamları ne zaman ve saat kaçta açıklanacak" sorusuna cevap arıyor.

articles.title: Europe’s “untouched” wilderness was shaped by Neanderthals and hunter-gatherers
articles.title_tr: Europe’s “untouched” wilderness was shaped by Neanderthals and hunter-gatherers
articles.summary: Long before agriculture, humans were transforming Europe’s wild landscapes. Advanced simulations show that hunting and fire use by Neanderthals and Mesolithic hunter-gatherers reshaped forests and grasslands in measurable ways. By reducing populations of giant herbivores, people indirectly altered how dense vegetation became. The findings challenge the idea that prehistoric Europe was an untouched natural world.
articles.summary_tr: Long before agriculture, humans were transforming Europe’s wild landscapes. Advanced simulations show that hunting and fire use by Neanderthals and Mesolithic hunter-gatherers reshaped forests and grasslands in measurable ways. By reducing populations of giant herbivores, people indirectly altered how dense vegetation became. The findings challenge the idea that prehistoric Europe was an untouched natural world.
articles.long_summary: Long before agriculture, humans were transforming Europe’s wild landscapes. Advanced simulations show that hunting and fire use by Neanderthals and Mesolithic hunter-gatherers reshaped forests and grasslands in measurable ways. By reducing populations of giant herbivores, people indirectly altered how dense vegetation became. The findings challenge the idea that prehistoric Europe was an untouched natural world.
articles.long_summary_tr: Long before agriculture, humans were transforming Europe’s wild landscapes. Advanced simulations show that hunting and fire use by Neanderthals and Mesolithic hunter-gatherers reshaped forests and grasslands in measurable ways. By reducing populations of giant herbivores, people indirectly altered how dense vegetation became. The findings challenge the idea that prehistoric Europe was an untouched natural world.
